tool_description: Take screenshots of any website or generate a pdf either from the website or an HTML file.
name: Web Capture
title: Web Capture

api_list.name: Generate PDF
api_list.description: Generate PDF by providing URL of any website.

api_list.name: Take  Image Screenshot
api_list.description: Get Screenshot of any website by providing URL and the  image ratio (width, height)

api_list.name: Get PDF from HTML
api_list.description: Generate PDF file by providing HTML.
